project.name: Hardtree
project.description:
Hardtree is an all-inclusive cloud-based business management system.
It is designed to both simplify and supercharge the management of all shapes and sizes of business information. Hardtree is built upon a cutting edge cloud service platform, meaning it can bring you the services available to enterprises for a fraction of the cost.
It comes as standard with a multitude of fantastic modules including Project Management, Sales and CRM and Service Support. Hardtree's collaborative modules work together to make sure that knowledge of each aspect of your business is available, where and when you need it.
